name: Armos Knight
description: A statue enemy that comes to life under certain conditions.

fields.name: Rail ID
fields.description: Defines the movement rail ID for the Armos Knight.

fields.name: Behavior
fields.description: Determines how the Armos Knight behaves.

1.name: Fixed
1.description: The Armos Knight stays in place.

2.name: Pushable
2.description: The Armos Knight can be pushed by the player.

3.name: Large, Attacks from Behind
3.description: A large Armos Knight that only attacks when approached from behind.

4.name: Large, Pushable
4.description: A large Armos Knight that can be pushed.

5.name: Large, Activated
5.description: A large Armos Knight that is activated upon interaction.

6.name: Default
6.description: The standard behavior for Armos Knights.

7.name: Large, Fixed
7.description: A large Armos Knight that remains stationary.
